Package ch.colabproject.colab.tests.tests

Class AbstractArquillianTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.colabproject.colab.tests.tests.AbstractArquillianTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessControlTest, ActivityFlowLinkRestEndpointTest, CardContentRestEndpointTest, CardRestEndpointTest, CardTypeRestEndpointTest, CypressTest, DatabaseTest, DocumentFileRestEndPointTest, DocumentRestEndpointTest, EffectiveAccessControlTeamRestEndpointTest, ProjectRestEndpointTest, ResourceAndReference1Test, ResourceAndReference2Test, ResourceAndReference3Test, ResourceAndReferenceMoveTest, ResourceCategoryRestEndpointTest, ResourceRestEndpointTest, SecurityTest, StickyNoteLinkRestEndpointTest, TeamRestEndoiintTest, UserRestEndpointTest
    @ExtendWith(org.jboss.arquillian.junit5.ArquillianExtension.class)
@ArquillianSuiteDeployment
public abstract class AbstractArquillianTest
extends Object
    Root class for Arquillian Based test.

    Arquillian boot EE application for testing purpose

    Author:
    maxence
